publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4182 Jackson Carlaw: HMP Low Moss—That the Parliament welcomes the news that the new prison being built in East Dunbartonshire will be named HMP Low Moss; congratulates the local community on the success of its campaign not to have the prison named HMP Bishopbriggs; further congratulates the Kirkintilloch Herald series for the considerable role it played in achieving this outcome by highlighting the issue in its pages on a regular basis over recent months, and believes that this is an excellent example of a local paper working in close conjunction with its readers to deliver on behalf of the local community, one of the many crucial functions performed by local newspapers being celebrated as part of Local Newspaper Week 2009.

S3M-4182 Jackson Carlaw: HMP Low Moss—That the Parliament welcomes the news that the new prison being built in East Dunbartonshire will be named HMP Low Moss; congratulates the local community on the success of its campaign not to have the prison named HMP Bishopbriggs; further congratulates the Kirkintilloch Herald series for the considerable role that it played in achieving this outcome by highlighting the issue in its pages on a regular basis over recent months, and believes that this is an excellent example of a local paper working in close conjunction with its readers to deliver on behalf of the local community, one of the many crucial functions performed by local newspapers being celebrated as part of Local Newspaper Week 2009.
S3M-4182 HMP Low Moss (lodged on 19 May 2009) Margaret Mitchell*, Ted Brocklebank*, Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*
S3M-4182 HMP Low Moss (lodged on 19 May 2009) John Lamont*, Jamie McGrigor*, Murdo Fraser*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-4182 HMP Low Moss (lodged on 19 May 2009) Annabel Goldie*
